title: Ger Your Own Handwriting Transformed into Dynamic Win/Mac Font for free
content:
Dear Brothers in Faith,

Have a distinguished handwriting?! Then, why not write the 36th Quranic chapter by hand to win your own handwriting transformed into dynamic font as done with [www.maryamsoft.com/product/font/wm\_reyhan-htm/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415230222/http:/www.maryamsoft.com/product/font/wm_reyhan-htm/ "www.maryamsoft.com/product/font/wm\_reyhan-htm/") . We've got the tools!

Happy Scripting

author: AzizMostafa
